objects.text: • PREMIUM NAVY BLUE • LIGHTWEIGHT • DURABLE SOLE

product_details.name: Classic Canvas Comfort: Urban Style Navy Blue Sneakers
product_details.description:
• Premium navy blue canvas material for breathable comfort
• Clean minimalist design perfect for casual and smart-casual outfits
• Durable white rubber sole with excellent grip
• Metal eyelets with matching navy laces for secure fit
• Lightweight construction for all-day wearing comfort
• Versatile color that pairs well with any outfit
• Cushioned insole for enhanced comfort
• Easy to maintain and machine washable
• Sleek white midsole creates attractive contrast
• Perfect for both casual wear and light activities

banner_details:
This banner design features a stylish and modern sneaker promotion with a bold and energetic aesthetic. The background consists of layered navy blue gradients with abstract flowing curves, accented by minimalist lines and translucent decorative dots that provide a dynamic and trendy feel. At the center, a circular frame highlights the product (canvas sneakers) placed neatly to draw attention. Above the image, bold headings with IDs `heading` and `subheading` announce the product line, using white and light blue tones for strong contrast. The orange circular price tag (`price`) stands out prominently to indicate affordability. At the bottom, a supporting text (`description`) outlines product features in a sleek white font. A bright orange rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with text (`cta`) invites users to shop, maintaining balance and urgency in the layout.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: `#1A3A5F`, `#1E4776`, `#234B76`, `#0F2C4D`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Light Blue: `#D8E8F5`, `#B5D1E8`
- Orange: `#FF7E00`
product_color: The product image features minimalist navy-blue canvas shoes with white soles and metallic eyelets, creating a clean, casual aesthetic. The dominant navy blue (#1E3A5F) provides a rich, grounded tone that reflects style and versatility. The white sole (#F4F4F4) and inner fabric tag contrast sharply against the dark body, giving visual balance and emphasizing the shoe's structure. Metallic eyelets (#C0C0C0), though subtle, add a modern industrial touch. These colors are harmoniously blended through smooth transitions along seam lines, while the contrast between blue and white highlights the product’s form. Suggested palette includes: Navy Blue (#1E3A5F), Light Blue (#AFCBFF), White (#F4F4F4), and Silver (#C0C0C0).
